item.title: Kobe Bryant Made Oscars History Three Times 7 Years Ago
item.description: Kobe Bryant is known for his legacy on the basketball court, but he also made cinema history three times at the Academy Awards in 2017.

item.title: Ip Man Reunion With Donnie Yen In His New Movie The Prosecutor Explained By Director & Star
item.description: Exclusive: Donnie Yen explains how a script change for The Prosecutor led to a reunion with one of his Ip Man co-stars on his latest feature.

item.title: A Stormlight Archive Adaptation Is Less Likely Now After Disappointing Brandon Sanderson Update
item.description: Brandon Sanderson’s disappointing update doesn’t bode well for a Stormlight Archive adaptation, though fans shouldn’t lose hope completely.
